## Data Science Projects

### UCLA Baseball Pitch Sequencing Analysis

[View Project](/projects/project1.qmd)

This project analyzes the effectiveness of different pitch sequences used by the UCLA baseball team:

-   Statistical analysis of pitch sequencing patterns
-   Evaluation of swing and miss percentages based on pitch type
-   Visualization of whiff rates and chase percentages
-   Identification of optimal pitch combinations

**Technologies used:** R, ggplot2, dplyr, gridExtra
